description: Monitor for account authentications in which MFA credentials are not provided by the user account to the authenticating entity. Analytic 1 - Windows Successful logons without MFA. index=your_index sourcetype="WinEventLog:Security" EventCode=4624 | eval MFA_used=if(searchmatch("MFA"), "Yes", "No") | where MFA_used="No" | stats count by Account_Name, Logon_Type, IpAddress, ComputerName Analytic 2 - Linux Successful logons without MFA. index=your_index sourcetype="linux_secure" OR sourcetype="macos_auth" "Accepted password" | eval MFA_used=if(searchmatch("MFA"), "Yes", "No") | where MFA_used="No" | stats count by user, src_ip, host
